Articles.Content: That is stop it completly. I am trying to push a rather large object to the moon with another rocket and it keeps slowly ratating so I can\'t line the two up. I tried editing the persistent.sfs file then I remember I didn\'t know what I was doing. Don\'t really care if it involves cheating slightly since the game isn\'t finished yet.
Going to 5x timewarp and then back to 2 or 1x should do it, since rails doesn\'t allow rotation. But it\'ll probably start to rotate again as soon as a force is applied to it.
